title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1704.9 - Other minimum provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1704.9 - Other minimum provisions

State Regulations
(a) The
following items shall be provided for each inmate: (1)
standard issue of clothing as per
department directives concerning inmate clothing; (2)
utensils and supplies for daily cell
cleaning; and
(3)
writing materials
(paper, pen or pencil, envelopes). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
1704.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
